text: Hashing table: parent1 "BNI" parent2 "BKE" offspring name "BNIBKE". hashed value "BNIBKE" (denoted BNIBKE^[,j]) given : BNIBKE^[,j] = (BNI[,j] + BKE[,j]) + (BNI[,j] * BKE[,j]) Un-hashing table: (0 + 0) + (0 * 0) = 0 ==> BNIBKE[,j] = 0 (0 + 1) + (0 * 1) = 1 ==> BNIBKE[,j] = 0 1 (0 + 2) + (0 * 2) = 2 ==> BNIBKE[,j] = 1 (1 + 1) + (1 * 1) = 3 ==> BNIBKE[,j] = 0 1 2 (1 + 2) + (1 * 2) = 5 ==> BNIBKE[,j] = 1 2 (2 + 2) + (2 * 2) = 8 ==> BNIBKE[,j] = 2 NA results NA
